Package com.abstratt.simon.metamodel.ecore.java2ecore

Class Context

Object
Context
public class Context
extends Object
A resolution context. Resolution contexts are created to perform the mapping of a Java element to an ECore element.

  • Method Details

    • resolve

      public <EC extends ENamedElement> void resolve​(Class<?> type, BiFunction<Context,​Class<?>,​EC> builder, Consumer<EC> consumer)
      Requests a type to be resolved in the context of mapping a Java element to a model element.
      Parameters:
      requestId - that Java element that we are mapping and needs resolution, or null for the class itself
      classToResolve - The Java class we need to resolve to a model element
      builder - a builder function that can, if necessary, map the Java type to a model element
      consumer - a function that will process the resulting model element

    • resolve

      public <EC extends ENamedElement> void resolve​(Object optionalRequestId, Class<?> classToResolve, BiFunction<Context,​Class<?>,​EC> builder, Consumer<EC> consumer)
      Requests a type to be resolved in the context of mapping a Java element to a model element.
      Parameters:
      requestId - that Java element that we are mapping and needs resolution, or null for the class itself
      classToResolve - The Java class we need to resolve to a model element
      builder - a builder function that can, if necessary, map the Java type to a model element
      consumer - a function that will process the resulting model element
